title: You Can Cross
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 260 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 540L
description: How do you safely cross the street? In You Can Cross, readers are provided with a comprehensive set of rules and easy-to-follow steps for how to cross the street safely. This book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events and to recognize and use nouns.
